articles.title: Samsung Releases New Feature Boost To Millions Of Galaxy Phones - Forbes
articles.description: After promising to bring One UI 6.1 to more devices, Samsung is now rolling out the update to older Galaxy phones.

articles.title: Helldivers 2 drops PSN account linking requirement for Steam players after widespread backlash - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: “We’re still learning what is best for PC players and your feedback has been invaluable,” say PlayStation.
articles.content: It’s been a tumultuous few days for Helldivers 2, as one of this year’s most beloved runaway hits managed to seemingly undo all of its goodwill and earn the ire of thousands of players in the blink o… [+3530 chars]
